title: Art History - Modern Art, 1900-1945
description: History of visual arts from the beginning to the middle of the twentieth century. Focus on significant European movements such as Fauvism, German Expressionism, Cubism, Dada, and Surrealism, as well as American Modernism. 4 lectures.
prerequisites: ART 111 or ART 112 or ART 211 or ART 212, or consent of instructor
